title: CANAL / WATERLOCK LEVER
description: this is the button-switch-lever-thing that closes the waterlock once it's been fixed on day 3

dialogueTree.title: Water Lock Control Panel: "A rusting control panel with loose..."
dialogueTree.text: A rusting control panel with loose wires dangling out from the hole where an indicator light used to be, and a mechanical lever sitting in the middle.

links.title: Logic: "Could this be why Morell hasn't ret..."
links.text: Could this be why Morell hasn't returned to Lena?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait... Could this be why Morell ha..."
links.text: Wait... Could this be why Morell hasn't returned to Lena?

links.title: You: ""So the coast is closed off. This m..."
links.text: "So the coast is closed off. This may be why Lena's husband Morell the cryptozoologist hasn't returned."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like it, yes. We should prob..."
links.text: "Looks like it, yes. We should probably go tell Lena. Take a load off her mind."

links.title: Empathy: "She *was* quite worried..."
links.text: She *was* quite worried...

links.title: You: "So the coast is closed off. Is this..."
links.text: So the coast is closed off. Is this why Lena's husband Morell the cryptozoologist hasn't returned?

links.title: Water Lock Control Panel: "The Water Lock Control Panel doesn'..."
links.text: The Water Lock Control Panel doesn't make for much of a partner, but yeah -- why not.

links.title: Logic: "You should probably tell Lena. It'l..."
links.text: You should probably tell Lena. It'll take a load off her mind.

links.title: You: "Pull the lever -- again."
links.text: Pull the lever -- again.

links.title: Water Lock Control Panel: "You grab the handle and pull the le..."
links.text: You grab the handle and pull the lever up. As soon as the metal connects against the contact pins you hear a loud *clunk*, then...

links.title: Water Lock Control Panel: "The water lock starts moving..."
links.text: The water lock starts moving...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All right." The lieutenant looks a..."
links.text: "All right." The lieutenant looks across the canal. "We can go to the coast now. Expect rugged terrain -- and drunks."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay..." The lieutenant looks acro..."
links.text: "Okay..." The lieutenant looks across the canal. "If we ever need to get to the coast, then this is the way. But please, contain your *wanderlust* for now. I don't want us to get sidetracked. Not with everything that's going on."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Focus on one thing, achieve it, the..."
links.text: Focus on one thing, achieve it, then the next... he thinks. That's the task chain.

links.title: Water Lock Control Panel: "You pull the lever all the way up u..."
links.text: You pull the lever all the way up until the metal clicks against the contact pins. You hear a soft *clunk*, then...

links.title: Water Lock Control Panel: "Nothing happens."
links.text: Nothing happens.

links.title: You: "Push it HARDER."
links.text: Push it HARDER.

links.title: Water Lock Control Panel: "Nothing happens. A cold gust of win..."
links.text: Nothing happens. A cold gust of wind blowing in from the sea interrupts the silence of the situation.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mm-hmm." The lieutenant hums to hi..."
links.text: "Mm-hmm." The lieutenant hums to himself while staring at your activities.

links.title: Man on water lock: "The man watches you in silence, ver..."
links.text: The man watches you in silence, very slowly cutting off another slice of his salami and putting it in his mouth.

links.title: You: "Release the lever."
links.text: Release the lever.

links.title: Water Lock Control Panel: "A spring brings the lever back to i..."
links.text: A spring brings the lever back to its original position. You still need to close the water lock to get across the canal -- some other way.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Wasn't there a sign over there sayi..."
links.text: Wasn't there a sign over there saying functionality will be restored on Wednesday morning?

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Isn't there a sign over there sayin..."
links.text: Isn't there a sign over there saying functionality will be restored on Wednesday morning?

links.title: You: "Pull the lever up."
links.text: Pull the lever up.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Visual Calculus: "This panel usually closes the water..."
links.text: This panel usually closes the water lock, turning it into a bridge that lets you cross the canal -- but there's a crashed "Samaran butter" sign in the way. Pulling the lever *probably* won't do anything.

dialogueTree.title: Water Lock Control Panel: "A couple of indicator lights are mi..."
dialogueTree.text: A couple of indicator lights are missing from this control panel. Loose wires dangle from the now-vacant holes. In the middle is a lever -- beneath it, a small metal plaque.
